name: Feather's Future
description:
Feather's future is for now a simple game that follows a story of Aaron and his little companion Feather bot. Aaron is faced with  constant dilemma of not being good enough, as he gets constantly denied  of climbing rank. Aaron, Winona and Blue all learn these ranks they have to climb hold more power then told. 

Hello everyone! Aari here. I'm really glad to be able to share my first project, It would mean the world if you could leave a comment or join my friend's discord server https://discord.gg/W9HXCx7 Where we will discuss and detail our game development.  I have been meaning to share this project for about a year now, but working alone can be hard, but I really hope this experimental demo can at least slightly hint at what I'm going for. And huge apology for all if the grammatical errors, still learning :' ) I have much more planned for the game, but i need honest critiques to be able to shape my project, as looking at it from the same lense can hide the flaws. I also apologize for any bugs or errors, some i'm aware of, and it will take me longer to fix them, but if you find any, please leave them in my discord or comments, thank you!

Credit:
